page.title: 11NEWSTEAD TRADING ESTATE
page.content: There are many industries and trading on the established estate. They include the following Mosspack, Northern Dairies, Remploy, Drayton Kiln Company, Palmer and Harvey, Aries, Speedi-Pack, Trentham Food Products, United Yeast Company, Akron Standard, Tilsley and Lovatt, Michelin, Clare Steel, Hazeldine Cash and Carry, Pennine Kitchens, Danish Bacon, Sippers and Co., Pork Farms and B.A.L. Adhesives. Here are some examples. Aries is a private firm which has been there for 10 years and most of their workers live in the Blurton area. It has 50 to 55 workers who make 3-piece suites. There is only the one factory in the country, supplying to Co-ops and other shops. Hazeldine cash and carry has been there for 3 years and is a family owned China Wholesaler.
